title: Best of the Program | Guest: Ezra Levant | 1/31/22
description:
Rebel News founder Ezra Levant joins to update Glenn on the freedom convoy of Canadian truckers protesting COVID mandates and the media's reaction to it. Glenn warns of the advancement of technology when the elite attempts to take control over it. The Spotify/Joe Rogan controversy continues as free speech continues to be attacked.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
